products.title: Pro-Lift Electric Bed Fittings - Heavy Duty with Remote Control
features: The electric bed lift with remote control is a smart and novel way to help with storage inside a bed.
Ideal for storage under bed
Opening angle in excess of 40° allows easy access.
Easy to install
Long brackets provided for better support to the bed platform
Electric motor easily meets the lifting requirements desired eliminating all manual effort.
Dead load range: 85-100 kgs. (Weight including 6-inch mattress & 18mm board cover)
Recommended minimum bottom thickness 18mm.
Motor capacity: 6000N
Available with a wireless remote controller.

products.title: Cube Shelving System
features: Design for portable cube shelving with aluminium profiles.
Aluminium profile with extended support available for 6mm glass & 16mm board.
Built for Strength and durability.
Easy to fit & Use.
Load Capacity for Plastic Connector: 10 kg max
Load Capacity for Aluminium Connector: 20 kg max
Compatible with Ebco Chipboard Screw (CBS-3012).
Aluminium Profile for Side Wall - Vertical sidewall profile designed for portability.
It holds glass/wood firmly in place, it is for 5mm glass or 16mm board.
Ensures structure stability by providing added support, rigidity and strength.
Connectors for cube shelving are now in die cast for extra strength and stability.
Perfect for modular cube shelving systems in homes, offices and retail spaces.
